verses.verse: Now <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>years<s%>; and they <S%H3680>covered<s%> him with <S%H899>clothes<s%>, but he gat no <S%H3179>heat<s%>. stricken: Heb. entered into days

Wherefore his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Let there be <S%H1245>sought<s%> for my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> a <S%H5291>young<s%> <S%H1330>virgin<s%>: and let her <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and let her <S%H5532>cherish<s%> him, and let her <S%H7901>lie<s%> in thy <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, that my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> may get <S%H2552>heat<s%>. Let there: Heb. Let them seek a young: Heb. a damsel, a virgin cherish: Heb. be a cherisher unto him

So they <S%H1245>sought<s%> for a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H5291>damsel<s%> throughout all the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H49>Abishag<s%> a <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> her to the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3303>fair<s%>, and <S%H5532>cherished<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H8334>ministered<s%> to him: but the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> her not.

Then <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith<s%> <S%H4984>exalted<s%> himself, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I will be <S%H4427>king<s%>: and he <S%H6213>prepared<s%> him <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him. be king: Heb. reign

And his <S%H1>father<s%> had not <S%H6087>displeased<s%> him at any <S%H3117>time<s%> in <S%H559>saying<s%>, Why hast thou done <S%H6213>so<s%>? and he also was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H8389><s%> man; and his mother <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%>. at any: Heb. from his days

And he <S%H1697>conferred<s%> with <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%>, and with <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>: and they <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> him. he: Heb. his words were with following: Heb. helped after Adonijah

But <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>, and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>, and <S%H7472>Rei<s%>, and the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> which belonged to <S%H1732>David<s%>, were not with <S%H138>Adonijah<s%>.

And <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H2076>slew<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%> and fat <S%H4806>cattle<s%> by the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H2120>Zoheleth<s%>, which is <S%H681>by<s%> <S%H5883>Enrogel<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> all his <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>: Enrogel: or, the well Rogel
But <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%>, and the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>, and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, he <S%H7121>called<s%> not.

Wherefore <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Hast thou not <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith<s%> doth <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and <S%H1732>David<s%> our <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> it not?

Now therefore <S%H3212>come<s%>, let me, I pray thee, give thee <S%H3289>counsel<s%> <S%H6098><s%>, that thou mayest <S%H4422>save<s%> thine own <S%H5315>life<s%>, and the <S%H5315>life<s%> of thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>.

<S%H3212>Go<s%> and get thee <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto him, Didst not thou, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H7650>swear<s%> unto thine <S%H519>handmaid<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3588>Assuredly<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me, and he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon my <S%H3678>throne<s%>? why then doth <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%>?

Behold, while thou yet <S%H1696>talkest<s%> there with the <S%H4428>king<s%>, I also will come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee, and <S%H4390>confirm<s%> thy <S%H1697>words<s%>. confirm: Heb. fill up

And <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> into the <S%H2315>chamber<s%>: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2204>old<s%>; and <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%> <S%H8334>ministered<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
And <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> <S%H6915>bowed<s%>, and did <S%H7812>obeisance<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>. And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, What wouldest thou? What: Heb. What to thee?

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, My <S%H113>lord<s%>, thou <S%H7650>swarest<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> unto thine <S%H519>handmaid<s%>, saying, Assuredly <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me, and he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon my <S%H3678>throne<s%>.
And now, behold, <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H4427>reigneth<s%>; and now, my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> it not:

And he hath <S%H2076>slain<s%> <S%H7794>oxen<s%> and fat <S%H4806>cattle<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>, and hath <S%H7121>called<s%> all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%>: but <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> hath he not <S%H7121>called<s%>.

And thou, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>, the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are upon thee, that thou shouldest <S%H5046>tell<s%> them who shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

Otherwise it shall come to pass, when my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, that I and my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> shall be counted <S%H2400>offenders<s%>. offenders: Heb. sinners
And, lo, while she yet <S%H1696>talked<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> also came <S%H935>in<s%>.

And they <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Behold <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>. And when he was come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself before the <S%H4428>king<s%> with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

And <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H113>lord<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>, hast thou <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me, and he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon my <S%H3678>throne<s%>?

For he is gone <S%H3381>down<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and hath <S%H2076>slain<s%> <S%H7794>oxen<s%> and fat <S%H4806>cattle<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>, and hath <S%H7121>called<s%> all the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%>, and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>; and, behold, they <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, and <S%H559>say<s%>, God <S%H2421>save<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah<s%>. God: Heb. Let king Adonijah live

But me, even me thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>, and thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, hath he not <S%H7121>called<s%>.

Is this <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H1961>done<s%> by my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and thou hast not <S%H3045>shewed<s%> it unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, who should <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him?

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7121>Call<s%> me <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%>. And she <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6440>presence<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>. into: Heb. before the king

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, that hath <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of all <S%H6869>distress<s%>,

Even as I <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thee by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Assuredly <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me, and he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon my <S%H3678>throne<s%> in my stead; even so will I certainly <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Then <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> <S%H6915>bowed<s%> with her <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and did <S%H7812>reverence<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Let my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7121>Call<s%> me <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>. And they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

The <S%H4428>king<s%> also <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3947>Take<s%> with you the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of your <S%H113>lord<s%>, and cause <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H7392>ride<s%> upon mine own <S%H6506>mule<s%>, and bring him <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H1521>Gihon<s%>: mine: Heb. which belongeth to me

And let <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him there <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and <S%H8628>blow<s%> ye with the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, God <S%H2421>save<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>.

Then ye shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, that he may <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon my <S%H3678>throne<s%>; for he shall be <S%H4427>king<s%> in my stead: and I have <S%H6680>appointed<s%> him to be <S%H5057>ruler<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and over <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> so too.

As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath been with my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, even so be he with <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, and <S%H1431>make<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H1431>greater<s%> than the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>.

So <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>, and the <S%H3774>Cherethites<s%>, and the <S%H6432>Pelethites<s%>, went <S%H3381>down<s%>, and caused <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> to <S%H7392>ride<s%> upon <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H6506>mule<s%>, and <S%H3212>brought<s%> him to <S%H1521>Gihon<s%>.

And <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> an <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> out of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>. And they <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>; and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, God <S%H2421>save<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2490>piped<s%> with <S%H2485>pipes<s%>, and <S%H8056>rejoiced<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%>, so that the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1234>rent<s%> with the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of them. pipes: or, flutes

And <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> and all the <S%H7121>guests<s%> that were with him <S%H8085>heard<s%> it as they had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H398>eating<s%>. And when <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%>, Wherefore is this <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7151>city<s%> being in an <S%H1993>uproar<s%>?

And while he yet <S%H1696>spake<s%>, behold, <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>: and <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Come <S%H935>in<s%>; for thou art a <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H381><s%>, and <S%H1319>bringest<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1319>tidings<s%>.

And <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H138>Adonijah<s%>, <S%H61>Verily<s%> our <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> hath made <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> with him <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>, and the <S%H3774>Cherethites<s%>, and the <S%H6432>Pelethites<s%>, and they have caused him to <S%H7392>ride<s%> upon the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6506>mule<s%>:

And <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H1521>Gihon<s%>: and they are come <S%H5927>up<s%> from thence <S%H8056>rejoicing<s%>, so that the <S%H7151>city<s%> rang <S%H1949>again<s%>. This is the <S%H6963>noise<s%> that ye have <S%H8085>heard<s%>.
And also <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%>.

And moreover the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> our <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> make the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3190>better<s%> than thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H1431>make<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H1431>greater<s%> than thy <S%H3678>throne<s%>. And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself upon the <S%H4904>bed<s%>.

And also thus <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which hath <S%H5414>given<s%> one to <S%H3427>sit<s%> on my <S%H3678>throne<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> even <S%H7200>seeing<s%> it.
And all the <S%H7121>guests<s%> that were with <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> were <S%H2729>afraid<s%>, and rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>.
